commands.name: END
commands.desc: stops the program on the client and on the server

commands.name: download <FILE TO DOWNLOAD>
commands.desc:
Downloads a file from the client to the server/downloads folder
Exemple: DOWNLOAD myfile.txt
Warning: Only files under or equal 1GB can be transfered!

commands.name: upload
commands.desc:
upload a file from server/uploads to the client's computer
When executed it will ask you the input file and the file destination
Warning: Only files under or equal 1GB can be transfered!
